name: Uganda Aviation School
about: Uganda Aviation Academy, established in 2011, is a privately owned aviation training school located in Kampala, Uganda. As an Approved Training Organization (ATO) by the Uganda Civil Aviation Authority (UCAA) and an Approved Training Centre (ATC) by the International Air Transport Association (IATA), the academy offers a range of courses including Airline Cabin Crew, Airline Customer Service, Airport Operations, and Aviation Security. Founded by Hon Flt Capt. George Michael Mukula (PhD), the school aims to address the shortage of flight professionals in the region. With highly qualified and experienced instructors, UAA provides training that meets industry standards, ensuring graduates are equipped for successful careers in aviation. Many graduates have been hired by regional and international airlines such as Qatar Airways, Emirates, and Kenya Airways. UAA is committed to providing high-quality aviation training and is easily accessible from across the region.
services:
["FLIGHT OPERATIONS AND DISPATCH (UCAA)
AIRPORT OPERATIONS (IATA)
CARGO INTRODUCTORY COURSE(IATA)
AIRLINE CABIN CREW TRAINING
AIRLINE CUSTOMER SERVICES (IATA)
IATA GDS FARES AND TICKETING COURSE (Amadeus)
AVIATION SECURITY AWARENESS (IATA)"]
